description: Association between childhood religious strictness and adult unhappiness
notes: Two-sided: direction not pre-specified; treat Likert as ordinal numeric.

description: Current religious practice correlates with monogamy preference and relationship satisfaction
estimand: Difference in means / logit marginal effect
notes: Test monogamy as binary/ordinal; relationship satisfaction as continuous/ordinal.

description: Teen family socioeconomic status relates to adult depression and stress
notes: Treat depression/stress items as continuous scales; robustness later.
Two-sample comparison; report effect size with CI.
